name: 4th International Symposium on Aviation and Aerospace System Engineering
content: 4th International Symposium on Aviation and Aerospace System Engineering (SAASE 2020) will be held in Chengdu, China, from 14 to 17,May, 2020, which is organized by Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers(HKSME).
organizers: Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers(HKSME).
